website_summaries.verdict: The modern version of a timeless design that exceeds expectations of at-home chefs.
pros: Designed for function as well as looks, this brand provides an effective set that appeals to creative cooks
We love the traditional design at a friendly price point

customer_reviews.title: The sizes are not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This item is described as being 6 x 10 x 4 inches. Not even close. The dishes are 5.5 x 10 x 3/4 inches. If you measure the actual space where the food goes, they are 6-1/2 x 3-3/4 x 3/4 inches. If you plan to cook single-serving enchiladas, lasagna, etc., these will not work - they are far too shallow and even if the sauce didn't gush out, you'd need two of these to make a single serving. Shepherds pie? Forget it, they'd be 1/2" tall after cooking. This might be good for a large creme brulee, or a small piece of fish, but that's about it. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Trinidad Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, good quality individual serving dishes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really liking these dishes. I bought them to replace two small casserole dishes I broke this past week. I was looking for something the same size and these are larger than what I had but so much nicer. I like to make individual servings of mac & cheese or scallopped potatoes, etc. and these dishes are excellent for that going directly from the oven to serving. They are dishwasher safe, microwave save AND oven safe. I like plain white because they go with whatever color or theme dinnerware I'm choosing to use.
customer_reviews.author: quiltmakerTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: At first when I opened the very well packaged box, I was disappointed that they were so shallow compared to the dishes they were replacing. But when I used water to measure, they should be able to hold as much as our old dishes--just not anything with a lot of sauce, which we don't normally do. I will be using these for individual servings of enchiladas, casseroles, and desserts. The benefit of them being more shallow than our old dishes is that they heat up faster, you get more crispness, and they stack very well and take up less room in the cabinet. Very happy with this purchase--especially with the fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Bhamster

customer_reviews.title: Small shallow dish - Labels difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer or importer placed labels on the product that prove extremely difficult to remove. These Chinese dishes come fairly shallow and the handles make an 8 inch interior come to the 10 inches they advertise. I recommend finding another alternative for oval dishes.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES F WIEMEYER

customer_reviews.title: My haddock came out just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had some friends over my house for dinner. I bought a bunch of haddock to cook in these dishes. I buttered these pans, put the fish in them and coated the fish with Ritz crackers mixed with melted butter. All of my guests commented on how great the fish tasted. These dishes went from the oven to the table. I'm looking for other things to cook in these. I'm thinking individual chicken pies would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Buckless

customer_reviews.title: Clean up was easy. They are now part of our weekly bakeware
customer_reviews.text: We used these dishes within an hour of opening the box. We made corn casserole in two and oeuf plats (baked eggs) in the other two dishes for dinner. The casserole was baked at 50 degrees, the eggs at broiler temp. No issues at either temp. Clean up was easy. They are now part of our weekly bakeware.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Williams

customer_reviews.title: The Height of Unimportance
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe they want a review of a set of miniature chafing dishes in white porcelain. Duh, arrived as pictured. Duh, just like all the others made over the past six centuries. This is not an electromagnetic vacuum cleaner. Next stupid question?
customer_reviews.author: David Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile little dishes!
customer_reviews.text: They blend with everything and are good for mini-casseroles, side vegetables, baked potatoes, custards, and on and on. They can be used in the oven or microwave, and clean up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for individual sides or to do something like ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful--just what I was expecting, and arrived the next day after I ordered it (with Prime). Perfect size for individual sides or to do something like meatballs with a little sauce and cheese under the broiler for a low-carb main dish. I can think of a lot of other uses too. Well packaged, no chips, and the sticker says they're microwave, oven, broiler, and freezer safe.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers complained about the stickers. I'm happy to say those were easily removable, front and back. They peeled off withe little effort. Other reviewers complained that the size was smaller than they wished, but I'm very happy with the size. We are trying to eat more normal-sized portions (please don't supersize me), and these make good-sized portions. I'm most impressed that I can put these under the broiler for a few minutes to brown foods.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: smaller and less substantial than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I should have ready the details more closely but I expected these to be more substantial based on the reviews. I decided to keep them for pet food dishes and even then they are really too small. There is also an ugly sticker that is smack in the middle of every plate that is really hard to get off. I wish I had returned them as soon as I saw them but felt it was my mistake and wanted to make it work. These are teeny, not very good quality and also look a bit strange. The handles have some kind of indentation on the edges and it's not consistent for each plate. Either way, bad purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: LRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I took a lot of time researching what dishes are safe to use in the toaster oven, most aren't. I found some that were safe but they came with a high price tag. These are safe to use in the toaster oven for less than other more expensive brands. I have only been using them for a week but Iove them! They are the perfect size and I can fit 2-3 in my toaster oven when needed. I use them in place of plates because I use the toaster oven to reheat all of our food.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBird

customer_reviews.title: Love These!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. They are exactly as described. Easy to clean, dishwasher proof, microwave proof, oven proof. I purchased them to make baked eggplant dishes. They're a great serving size and really look elegant on the table too. Extremely pleased with these. Just wish they had come in a set of 6. Great value for the price. I highly recommend these. May even purchase another set!
customer_reviews.author: Northern Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Creme brulee, but not only
customer_reviews.text: These plates are a little bit smaller than expected, but sincerely I had not checked their diameter before ordering them. It is not that important because they are sufficient to bake creme brulee or patatoes gratins. However, I would recommend ramekins for the gourmands. These plates are made of porcelan and resist to the oven, micro-wave, dishwasher, etc. I wouldn't use them to bake mini quiche-lorraine because they are not that deep, but I would definitively put already baked mini-quiche lorraine in it because these plates are really nice and can be used as presentation plates for individual mini breads or mini pies, or individual portions of cheese, etc....
customer_reviews.author: VeroTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these dishes! We use them all of the time for pasta, things we want separated on a plate, etc. I haven’t used them to broil anything yet. I wash them on top rack of dishwasher without any issues. My son said “ooh fancy” first time we used them. A great price for a little bit of convenience and “fancy” :)
customer_reviews.author: turtle hulahan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make Enchiritos (burrito and an enchilada combined) with left/over taco meat. I can put them in the microwave and it's ready to serve a good quick meal and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne R.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use them..
customer_reviews.text: Received my order in a timely fashion. The dishes were package well. There were no chips or broken pieces. I haven’t used them yet But they have been through a dishwasher cycle. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Rharrell

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband, who loves serving individual appetizers, and he loves them. They're perfect size and they go from oven to table, which is great, and the price is great. The only warning I have is that they're round, not oval like the French gratin dishes--I know it says "round" in the title, but they look oval in the photo and I'm guessing many people just look at that (I did!).
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Sticker and speck problem
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. You might find a few specks in the porcelain. I ordered twelve and none had specks in the top but did have a few with a black soeck on the sides. The sticker on the top was a tough one to remove. Even a challenge for my adhesive remover.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Sticker warning!
customer_reviews.text: These came with fancy stickers on them. Not easy to remove. Spent the better part of a mining soaking, spraying, scraping to remove all of the sticker.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly SPIKE

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control, appear to be seconds.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like them. Nice shape & size, though a bit light weight, but 4 out of 4 have readily observable glaze defects right out of the box. You don’t have to be picky to not want large brown & black specks on areas that food won’t even cover. One had a small chip in the bottom next to the product sticker, who knows what may be under those. If you like nice & new, these probably aren’t for you. I hate sending things back, but these are DEFINITELY going back.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L.

customer_reviews.title: I love these dishes
customer_reviews.text: I use them all the time to serve things in, to cook dishes in, they are sturdy and a kitchen essential. have a set and also gave a set to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Hammerhead

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised .
customer_reviews.text: These are very good every day dishes. Not super high end, but nice looking for family and casual dining with friends. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: Very Good... Just the Right Size for our Chile Rellenos
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Chile Rellenos we wanted to try... Just the right size... I noticed that the height of the sides is just enough, so when you using your fork to cut something, the side is just high/low enough to allow the fork to contact the bottom to make a clean cut right up TO the sides... I don't know if that was planned or not... but, it sure is NICE! We like them very much... We are very happy with them...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lyddon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for one or two people!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and love the photo taken when delivery was made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Porcelain Round Au Gratin Brulee 5-inch dishes/set of 6
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly individualized sized porcelain round au gratin/brulee dishes for baked eggs, creme brulee and/or any side dish you wish to serve. The dishes are not as nice as the ones that cost $20 a piece but for as often as they are used, they look/work perfectly fine for the price. The dishes arrived well packed and in the time frame promised.
customer_reviews.author: JulianeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are great. I use these dishes all the time to heat up food in the oven for easy deserve snacks or meals.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Foss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for individual servings
customer_reviews.text: I use these for individual servings of potatoes au gratin, and any vegetables that I am preparing.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for single-serving meals
customer_reviews.text: I love these for reheating leftovers (sometimes blanketed with cheese) in the toaster oven, or dip or gratin, there's something very charming about the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kitster

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had with these dishes was the glazing. There were a few black specks which look like dirt or dust and is not very appealing to the eye. Also with a set of four and all of them having specks on them. I can say the quality control isn’t very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kenith F.

customer_reviews.title: They can go under the broiler
customer_reviews.text: Great for shrimp dishes and filet of fish. Make a great presentation at the dinner table!
customer_reviews.author: DiLee

customer_reviews.title: ~ Bargain for 4 Dishes!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for! Simple, clean white 10" dishes are perfect for an individual serving. Like that these can be placed under the broiler. $30 price for 4 dishes is a bargain considering some Au Gratin dishes can cost $15+ per piece.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Mc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect size to go from microwave to toaster oven & these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baking needs in individual servings. Very durable and pretty, cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: hotairballoon

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and clean up after being in the oven with lasagna was good.
customer_reviews.author: TOOTSTERSMAMA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a vesicle for my french onion dumpling and this perfect
customer_reviews.author: GGNY

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for individual mac & cheese or special desserts.
customer_reviews.author: D. McD.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dishes
customer_reviews.text: But I wish they were a little deeper. Not good for lasagna.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Manci

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: I clearly didn’t read carefully enough, but these are tiny. They are great for smaller tables and meal items
customer_reviews.author: Ktiy

customer_reviews.title: STICKY LABELS
customer_reviews.text: Labels on top and bottom ridiculously hard to remove!!! Took half an hour with a razor blade and Goo-Gone for 4 dishes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cardot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for individual meal
customer_reviews.text: Bake fish on a bed of spinach in these all the time. Cleans up easily they still look new.
customer_reviews.author: KLblade

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Made in China, it never said where it was made. Also, they put a sticker in the center of each dish that is impossible to get off plus a made in China sticker on the back which is even harder to get off. Product looks nice but I would never have bought it had I known it was made in China.
customer_reviews.author: KREILLY

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love to make Italian food and these plates are perfect for it. These were double the cost at central market and they are the exact same plates and brand. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hnel

customer_reviews.title: Great for single serving meals.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for making one meal dishes. This is our second set and use them for making dishes like Lasagna and Baked Haddock. They seem to stand up to baking and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: 2DogAle

customer_reviews.title: Nice individual dishes
customer_reviews.text: Nice individual dishes! Not very heavy as my old ones were. Perfect for my purposes though. So much easier to make individual dishes like tortellini, manicotti etc. and easier to serve to my family.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johanna, Lexington, Mi

customer_reviews.title: He loved them and is planning on purchasing more
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my father. He loved them and is planning on purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Smaller is healthier
customer_reviews.text: Does just what I needed. Hard to find glassware/porcelain that is broiler sturdy. The dishes are small, but good for our diminished appetites. Maybe smaller portions are what we fat Americans need right now?
customer_reviews.author: Maine Sage

customer_reviews.title: Love that it handles the oven and the dishwasher well
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this except I wish it was a bit larger. Works well for smaller servings. Cleans up well. Love that it handles the oven and the dishwasher well.
customer_reviews.author: Father of six

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Not flawless. Has “pimples” throughout, but will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn Mikedaniel

customer_reviews.title: These dishes can be used under a broiler,
customer_reviews.text: The dishes work as I expected for seafood under a broiler. They also cleaned up well too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim from Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great.. Bur arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Good dishes. But one arrived broken. I mean I understand it gets tossed around through carrier. But Damn. Please make aire you handle folks stuff with care. Its not too much to ask. Other that.the product is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: They are great for desserts also (creme Brule
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make scallops Provencal and they do work perfectly for that. They are great for desserts also (creme Brule, although a large serving). The sides are a little lower than I was looking for initially, but I have still put them to good use in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy SumnerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a good set of these for a long time and so far these have held up well

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe, does a great job, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for side dishes! Keeps veggies out the steak juices. Oven safe, dishwasher safe, just all around good stuff.

customer_reviews.title: but love them because they are one of the few that ...
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller then I thought they would be, but love them because they are one of the few that can be put under the broiler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. I wanted them bigger, so I haven’t found a use for these yet.

customer_reviews.title: Really useful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for creme brûlée , cherry clafoutis, ice cream, fruit salad, individual entree, kids snack, ..... I use them so often... You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: celine

customer_reviews.title: Best side dishes ever and great for the oven
customer_reviews.text: Best baking dishes ever and so easy to clean also are the best size for side dishes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't use them much but when i do always the right solution

customer_reviews.title: Utility
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good utility dish to bake or broil food items.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Proportioned
customer_reviews.text: Baking dishes were perfect size for single serve portions. Particularly baked dishes. Also great for side dishes.

customer_reviews.title: Question discriptions.
customer_reviews.text: I returned them. I thought they were plain but they had some uneven impression designs in them at each end that were not even the same in the four. VERY disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great casserole dishes. A little on the large size, but work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I know, unorthodox use, but these really do make phenomenal cat dishes -- they have handles and are angled so cats cat get the food out of the corners! Also clean easily in dish washer. Wish they were a little smaller -- prefer those made by Cordon Bleu, but for the price these are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: KChappelle

customer_reviews.title: Good size and value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect size for individual servings of my Shepherd's pie! They are well packed to prevent damage. No flaws were noticed in the glazing or design.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara O

customer_reviews.title: Too shallow
customer_reviews.text: Wish we'd read the reviews before purchasing. Yes, these dishes are shallow. The specifications on the purchase page were 10.5" long (actual 10") x 3.5" deep (actual 1.125") x 6" wide (actual 5.5"). Disappointed because the depth was important to us.

customer_reviews.title: Short-changed
customer_reviews.text: The three dishes that I received look nice, but this was advertised as a set of four!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: HIC Harold Import Co. Kitchen Oval Au Gratin Baking Dish Set, Fine White Porcelain, 10-Inch, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Style Name:12 Ounce, Set of 4HIC Kitchen’s set of 4 Fine Porcelain Oval Au Gratin Dishes are perfect for baking and serving casseroles and au gratin recipes. Specially designed for use in the oven and under the broiler, they’re perfect for making au gratin potatoes, scalloped potatoes, pot pie, shepherds pie, even baked mac and cheese or other single-serving recipes. Beautifully designed with flared handles on both sides makes handling them easy, both into and out of the oven. This porcelain casserole dish performs beautifully as bakeware and equally well as serveware for every dining occasion, from breakfast to lunch or brunch, for holiday meals, party buffets, even outdoor entertaining. A tradition since 1957, HIC’s fine-quality porcelain serveware is durable, heat resistant, and free from lead and cadmium. It’s safe for use in the freezer, microwave, oven, broiler (to 350-degrees Fahrenheit), and dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. Brought to you by HIC-Harold Import Company. Set of 4 Oval Au Gratin Baking Dishes (10-inch).
feature_bullets: HIC Kitchen’s set of 4 Fine Porcelain Oval Au Gratin Baking Dishes for baking and serving au gratin recipes, casserole, and single-serving recipes
Made from fine-quality porcelain; lead and cadmium free; each measures 10 x 5.25 x 1.75-inches and holds 12-ounces
Beautifully designed with flared handles on both sides for easy handling into and out of the oven
Great for potato au gratin, scalloped potatoes, pot pie, shepherds pie, even baked mac and cheese
Durable; safe for freezer, microwave, oven, broiler (to 350-degrees Fahrenheit); dishwasher safe for easy cleanup
